SEARCH
Package abm

Class InteractionManager

java.lang.Object
abm.InteractionManager
public class InteractionManager extends Object
The InteractionManager class handles agent movement, collision detection and out-of-bounds removal within the simulation area.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    InteractionManager(double minX, double minY, double maxX, double maxY)
    This constructor initializes the InteractionManager with the boundaries of the simulation area.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Agent>
    collide(List<Agent> agents)
    This function detects collisions between all pairs of agents in the provided list.
    int
    getRemovedMeteoritesCount()
    This function returns the number of meteorites that have been removed from the simulation because they went outside the boundaries.
    void
    move(List<Agent> agents)
    This function moves all agents in the provided list and removes any agents that go out of the simulation area boundaries.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • InteractionManager

      public InteractionManager(double minX, double minY, double maxX, double maxY)
      This constructor initializes the InteractionManager with the boundaries of the simulation area.
      Parameters:
      minX - The minimum X coordinate.
      minY - The minimum Y coordinate.
      maxX - The maximum X coordinate.
      maxY - The maximum Y coordinate.

  • Method Details

    • move

      public void move(List<Agent> agents)
      This function moves all agents in the provided list and removes any agents that go out of the simulation area boundaries.
      Parameters:
      agents - The list of agents to move and check.

    • getRemovedMeteoritesCount

      public int getRemovedMeteoritesCount()
      This function returns the number of meteorites that have been removed from the simulation because they went outside the boundaries.
      Returns:
      The number of removed meteorites.

    • collide

      public List<Agent> collide(List<Agent> agents)
      This function detects collisions between all pairs of agents in the provided list. If a collision is detected, the 'handleCollision' method is called on both agents to handle the collision effects. Agents marked for removal during collision handling are then removed from the list.
      Parameters:
      agents - The list of agents to check for collisions.
      Returns:
      A list of agents that were removed due to collisions.
